name: NodeReal
highlight: NodeReal offer complete blockchain infrastructure and services for all, with a focus on scalability, reliability, and efficiency.
summary: NodeReal is a one-stop blockchain infrastructure and service provider that embraces the high-speed blockchain era and empowers developers by “Make your Web3 Real”. We provide scalable, reliable, and efficient blockchain solutions for everyone, aiming to support the adoption, growth, and long-term success of the Web3 ecosystem.
